title: Ep. 12 - Minecraft ends our friendship
description: Ludwig, the minecraft criminal, betrays the trust of his friends once again. This time, inside the virtual slaughterhouse that is Minecraft. The boys discuss Aiden's sinister videogame behaviors, Ludwig hangs out with Shroud, and Nick tells the tale of the fish girl.

itunes:author: The Yard
